metadata.title: Tuesday, 19th October, 2021
metadata.session: FIRST SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) why the tarring of the Chikankata Mission Road in Chikankata District stalled;
(b) when the project will resume; and
(c) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.
(a) whether there is any money at the Lusaka District Education Board Secretary’s office meant for the construction of Chawama Secondary School in Chawama Parliamentary Constituency;
(b) if so, when the money will be applied to the intended purpose; and
(c) what the cause of delay in  releasing the money is.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to empower women and youths in Mufumbwe District who are involved in the following agricultural activities:
(i) fish farming; and (ii) livestock farming; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Commerce, Trade and Industry when a reduction in prices of goods is expected to take effect following the appreciation of the Zambian Kwacha against other convertible currencies.
Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct the following in Mufumbwe District:
(i) a modern police station; and (ii) staff houses for police officers; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) why the rehabilitation of the Njoko-Mwape-Kalunga-Fube road in Chilubi District has stalled;
